content: introducing the fairy floss throw designed to bring both style and simplicity to your crocheting experience this pattern showcases a unique twist by utilizing two different yarns held double resulting in a stunning self-striping effect with an array of colors available you can customize your blanket to match any decor the pattern features a 4 row repeat making it a breeze to stitch up and perfect for all skill levels this pattern is free on my blog 1 find the fairy floss throw as a kit with lion brand 2 the kit comes with all the yarn you need to make your blanket plus a free copy of the printable digital pattern you can even customize your yarn colors i have a full video tutorial available on my youtube channel 3 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-fairy-floss-throw-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/47tel 3 https //youtu be/hpzq18tvpv8
